channel.title: ::checkbank command
channel.description:
I've tried looking all over the net, followed what they're said but I keep getting errors. Could someone send me a link to a good a good ::checkbank command. Thank you.
Also, using 317 pi

item.title: ::checkbank command
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:6, topic:507258”]I fixed it.

But I want to be able to do ::checkbank command on someone’s bank, even if there offline… ATM it only works for someone who is online[/quote]

Err make it load the txt file of the name you’re specifying or something I think o.o

Read full topic

item.title: ::checkbank command
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

[quote=“TheLetterQArousesMe, post:2, topic:507258”]Something like

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“checkbank”) && c.playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex == 0)
				return;

			Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

			if (p == null)
				return;

			int backupItems[] = new int[c.bankItems.length];
			int backupItemsN[] = new int[c.bankItems.length];

			for (int i = 0; i < c.bankItems.length; i++) {
				backupItems[i] = c.bankItems[i];
				backupItemsN[i] = c.bankItemsN[i];
			}

			for (int i = 0; i < p.bankItems.length; i++) {
				c.bankItems[i] = p.bankItems[i];
				c.bankItemsN[i] = p.bankItemsN[i];
			}

			c.resetBank();
			c.openUpBank();

			for (int i = 0; i < c.bankItems.length; i++) {
				c.bankItemsN[i] = backupItemsN[i];
				c.bankItems[i] = backupItems[i];
			}

		} catch (Exception e) {
			c.sendMessage("Invalid Player.");
		}
	}[/code][/quote]

is that all i have to add?
nothing else…?

got errors…

Read full topic

item.title: ::checkbank command
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You’re using a Project Insanity source, no need to include the 317 part of it. If you just mention the words Project Insanity, people will know that it’s a 317.

Read full topic

item.title: ::checkbank command
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

Something like

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“checkbank”) && c.playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(10);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex == 0)
				return;

			Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

			if (p == null)
				return;

			int backupItems[] = new int[c.bankItems.length];
			int backupItemsN[] = new int[c.bankItems.length];

			for (int i = 0; i < c.bankItems.length; i++) {
				backupItems[i] = c.bankItems[i];
				backupItemsN[i] = c.bankItemsN[i];
			}

			for (int i = 0; i < p.bankItems.length; i++) {
				c.bankItems[i] = p.bankItems[i];
				c.bankItemsN[i] = p.bankItemsN[i];
			}

			c.resetBank();
			c.openUpBank();

			for (int i = 0; i < c.bankItems.length; i++) {
				c.bankItemsN[i] = backupItemsN[i];
				c.bankItems[i] = backupItems[i];
			}

		} catch (Exception e) {
			c.sendMessage("Invalid Player.");
		}
	}[/code]

Read full topic
